title: VR-Based Technical Training Design: Applying a Blended Learning Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of technical processes and leadership experience
context.additional_context: A VR technology training course for managers/leaders to enhance social sector job competencies, operated in a digitally supported environment with summative assessment-centered design

learning_goals: Learners design strategies to apply step-by-step analysis of complex technical processes in real-world tasks using VR simulations.

Within six months, learners select three VR training modules in blended learning environments (online+offline) and design an educational scenario reducing cognitive load by 20% for 10 team members using cognitive load measurement tools (e.g., NASA-TLX survey)
Learners quantitatively measure learning outcomes of VR-based training through project-based assessments and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
